venue.name: The Asgard Irish Pub and Restaurant

item.description:
Ladies & Gentlemen,

You are invited to Boston Demon's official Australia Day Party for 2011. This year it will be held at the Asgard Irish Pub & Restaurant on Saturday 29th January and is set to be the best yet. We have live Australian music, Aussie beer, meat pies courtesy of KO Pies, raffles, auctions, giveaways as well as the annual ‘Peter Garrett-off’.

Festivities kick off at 2pm and will go long into the night. Remember to get your Aussie costume together as there are prizes for the best dressed!

All welcome and encouraged to fill their boots regardless of nationality. $10 entry to the best party of the year!

The Boston Demons will donate a portion of the days takings to the flood tragedy in Australia

Public parking garage available behind the Asgard for reasonable cost.
Central Sq T few mins walk away.

Get your 2011 Aussie Day t-shirt now from www.danmilbourne.com. Order soon as stock is limited and will sell out soon!

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Australia Day Party/Flood Fundraiser
